title: Daily Missions
body: Just wanted to clarify from a Rioter or someone that knows what's going on. Do you only get 3 daily missions and that's it? Or you get some everyday?

replies.body: ialso only got 3 missions,while my friends got like 4 or 6 :(
Change icon and rejoin a game

You will only be getting a limited number of missions each day unless you purchase the Order/Chaos Passes. Those passes unlock addition mission lines which would allow you to do more than 3 missions a day.

EDIT: This is in fact not true. You will only be receiving 2 daily missions each day.
There is a limited amount of missions each day unless you buy the pass which has some extras missions that are separate from the daily missions.
